title: Video: Blaue Blume – In Disco Lights
body:
This is awesome on so many levels.

First of all, **Blaue Blume’s** _In Disco Lights_ is perhaps the best song of the year. Come end of year lists, this is going to be in my top ten, I know it already. Secondly, this video has a straight up classic 90’s feel to it, I’m half expecting Damon Albarn to prance into the picture. Hell. Enough of my rambling, check it out below.
